head.supplied: Melbourne bot. Garden ¶ 29/6/65 ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ In accordance with the regulations of the stores and transport Department I have the honor to solicit, that you will be pleased to grant on the estimates for...

div.p: M65/5765, unit 103, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

In accordance with the regulations of the stores and transport Department I have the honor to solicit, that you will be pleased to grant on the estimates for 1866 the same amounts for forage and for stores required next year in this establishment, as you were pleased to sanction this year, vize

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
cell.p: Stores, Stationery for the Office and botanical museum, Timber, Tools, Flowerpots, Labels, Paint, Fuel for Hothouses &c

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;
cell.p: Forage for draught-horses, employed in gardenwork, and for such quadrupeds, singing-birds, waterbirds &c as are retained at the botanic Garden & its reserves

cell.style: padding-left: 0.0556in; padding-right: 0.0556in; padding-top: 0in; padding-bottom: 0in; border: none;

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p: I have the honor to be

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
The honorable the Chief Secretary
On 6 July 1865 the Under Secretary, J. Moore, sent M's letter to the Tender Board. It was noted there and returned on 14 August. follow up ref in Tender Board. SM: perhaps.
